column4: hi, new install of 10.04 and it doesnt auto detect my usb hard drives. worked perfectly under 10.04 beta 1
after plugging in the drive or removing it, what happens when you type tail /var/log/messages?
where can i paste the output? i dont want to flood the channel
Do you see anything that looks like your USB.
yep, pr 30 19:00:15 sephiroth kernel: [ 6055.569280]  sdd: sdd1 < sdd5 >
Did you get any error messages?
yeah an unclean file system The file system wasn't safely closed on Windows. Fixing
backup everything on that drive that is important to you.
it mounted to the folder i created
From experience, you may notice that some stuff is missing/modified/corrupted.
Disks should be unmounted before they are removed. Some filesystems recover better than others.
